title: Windsurf Adds MCP Support for Custom Tool Integration
content: Windsurf implements Model Context Protocol (MCP) support, enabling developers to connect custom tools and extend the IDE's AI capabilities.
summary: Windsurf implements Model Context Protocol (MCP) support, enabling developers to connect custom tools and extend the IDE's AI capabilities....

title: StackBlitz (Bolt.new) Reaches $700M Valuation Talks
content: StackBlitz, creator of Bolt.new, is in talks for Series B funding at a $700 million valuation following explosive growth to $40M ARR.
summary: StackBlitz, creator of Bolt.new, is in talks for Series B funding at a $700 million valuation following explosive growth to $40M ARR.

title: Claude Opus 4 Sets New SWE-bench Record at 72.5%
content: Anthropic's Claude Opus 4 achieves 72.5% on SWE-bench, setting a new state-of-the-art record for autonomous software engineering capabilities.
summary: Anthropic's Claude Opus 4 achieves 72.5% on SWE-bench, setting a new state-of-the-art record for autonomous software engineering capabilities....

title: Google's Jules AI Coding Agent Faces User Backlash Over Severe Beta Limitations
content: Early adopters of Google's Jules autonomous coding agent report significant frustration with the restrictive 5 requests per day limit during beta, with failed tasks still consuming quota and reliability issues hampering productivity.
summary: Early adopters of Google's Jules autonomous coding agent report significant frustration with the restrictive 5 requests per day limit during beta, with failed tasks still consuming quota and reliability issues hampering productivity.

title: Cursor Fusion Tab Model Enhances Multi-File Editing
content: Cursor releases Fusion Tab Model with advanced multi-file editing capabilities and syntax highlighting, improving code understanding across entire projects.
summary: Cursor releases Fusion Tab Model with advanced multi-file editing capabilities and syntax highlighting, improving code understanding across entire projects....

title: Cursor Reaches $100M ARR, Fastest SaaS Growth
content: Cursor achieves $100M annual recurring revenue, becoming the fastest SaaS company to reach this milestone from $1M ARR, with 360,000 paying customers.
summary: Cursor achieves $100M annual recurring revenue, becoming the fastest SaaS company to reach this milestone from $1M ARR, with 360,000 paying customers....

title: Google Jules Public Beta Launches with 52.2% SWE-bench Score
content: Google releases Jules AI agent in public beta, powered by Gemini 2.0 Flash achieving 52.2% on SWE-bench, offering 5 tasks per day during beta period.
summary: Google releases Jules AI agent in public beta, powered by Gemini 2.0 Flash achieving 52.2% on SWE-bench, offering 5 tasks per day during beta period....
